code: import axios from'axios';import{GET_ITEMS,ADD_ITEM,DELETE_ITEM,ITEMS_LOADING,EDIT_ITEM,UPDATE_ITEM}from'./types';export var getItems=function getItems(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setItemsLoading());axios.get('/api/items').then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_ITEMS,payload:res.data});});};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/api/items',item).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:ADD_ITEM,payload:res.data});});};};export var deleteItem=function deleteItem(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/api/items/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:DELETE_ITEM,payload:id});});};};export var editItem=function editItem(id){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/api/items/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:EDIT_ITEM,payload:id});});};};export var updateItem=function updateItem(id,item){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/api/items/',id,item).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:UPDATE_ITEM,payload:id});});};};export var setItemsLoading=function setItemsLoading(){return{type:ITEMS_LOADING};};
